questions.question: What is the main reason so many people moved to California in 1849?

options.A: California land was fertile, plentiful, and inexpensive.
options.B: Gold was discovered in central California.
options.C: The east was preparing for a civil war.
options.D: They wanted to establish religious settlements.

questions.question: Which of these assessment findings, if identified in a client who has pneumonia, indicates that the client needs suctioned?

options.B: Respiratory rate of 18 breaths per minute.
